projects.title: OffCampusRooms
projects.summary: Platform connecting students with verified housing options with advanced search, filtering, and admin dashboard.
projects.description: Student housing marketplace with verified listings, advanced filtering, and admin CMS.
features: Admin dashboard with CRUD and media uploads
JWT authentication and role-based access control

projects.title: Masjid Directory & Salah Times
projects.summary: Web platform for mosques to manage profiles, events, and Salah times with SEO and real-time updates.
projects.description: Directory and schedule platform for mosques with SEO-optimized pages and events.
features: Salah times management with real-time updates
Mosque profiles with images and location

projects.title: University Email Verifier
projects.summary: Backend Node.js and Express project that automatically generates possible university email combinations and sends verification emails.
projects.description: A backend Node.js and Express project that automatically generates possible university email combinations (e.g. 202219525@myturf.ul.ac.za), sends verification emails via Nodemailer, and stores only valid addresses in MongoDB.
features: Automatic email generation based on university patterns
MongoDB storage for valid addresses only

projects.title: Al-Qur'an API (Open Source Contribution)
projects.summary: Contributed to the open-source Al-Qur'an API project, which provides developers with access to Qur'an text, translations, and audio recitations.
projects.description: Contributed to the open-source Al-Qur'an API project, which provides developers with access to Qur'an text, translations, and audio recitations. Helped improve backend performance and API structure.
